definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: In this paper, some new conclusions about the properties of elliptic paraboloid are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 推出椭圆抛物面的几条性质，得到一些新的结果。

sentences.english: This method can also be used for paraboloid and hyperboloid.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法也适用于抛物面和双曲面。

sentences.english: Offset paraboloid antenna has widely been utilized in small aperture antennas.
sentences.chinese: 偏置抛物面无线在小口径天线中得到了广泛的应用。

sentences.english: The third kind of solar oven is a parabolic cooker.
sentences.chinese: 第三类是太阳炉抛物面炉。

sentences.english: It is this parabola and is pointing up.
sentences.chinese: 这就是那个抛物面，它是开口向上的。

sentences.english: The design of an airborne off-set parabolic reflector antenna with low sidelobes is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了机载雷达低副瓣偏馈抛物面无线的设计。

sentences.english: The parabolic reflector of a searchlight gives a parallel beam.
sentences.chinese: 探照灯的抛物面反射镜发出平行光束。

sentences.english: I should stop integrating where my paraboloid hits the xy plane.
sentences.chinese: 在当抛物面与xy平面相交的地方就停止积分。

sentences.english: This is the paraboloidal mirror at the bottom of the tube.
sentences.chinese: 是位于镜筒底部的一块抛物面镜。

sentences.english: Of course, I didn't tell you which way I am orienting my paraboloid.
sentences.chinese: 当然这是因为没给出抛物面的的正方向。

sentences.english: OK, it's what you get by taking a parabola and rotating it.
sentences.chinese: 旋转一条抛物线，就能得到这个抛物面。
